snippet: Readers describe a mixed legacy for Justice Scalia, and object to Republicans’ call for delay in choosing a successor.
lead_paragraph: Readers describe a mixed legacy for Justice Scalia, and object to Republicans’ call for delay in choosing a successor.

headline.print_headline: Scalia’s Legacy, and the G.O.P. Stance on a Successor
headline.main: Antonin Scalia’s Legacy, and the G.O.P. Stance on a Successor
